name: Tryna Snacc
description:
A vaporwave-inspired puzzle platformer made for Ludum Dare 38.

Controls:

A/D: Left/Right

W: Jump

S: Crouch/Enter Doors

R: Reset Puzzle (This will also reset the camera, so use it to fix camera glitches)

E: Use Weight

F: Use Slingshot

Developed by the SLA Vaporwave Men's Choir: Cameron Samodai, Liam Hart, and Michael Thayres, featuring Chloe Hart.

Inspired by the art of Yoko Honda.
